#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
ll mod=100000007;

ll gcd(ll a,ll b)
{
          return b?gcd(b,a%b):a;
}

int main()
{
    pair<ll,ll>p[4];
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t-->0)
    {
                for(int i=0; i<4; i++)
                scanf("%lld%lld", &p[i].first, &p[i].second);
                sort(p, p+4);
                p[1].first=abs(p[1].first-p[0].first);
                p[1].second=abs(p[1].second-p[0].second);
                ll ar=((p[1].first*p[1].first)+(p[1].second*p[1].second))%mod;
                ll b=gcd(p[1].first,p[1].second)%mod;
                //cout<<ar<<" "<<b<<endl;
                ll ans=2*ar*(ar+1-2*b)%mod;
                ans+=mod;
                ans=ans%mod;
                printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
